Package com.github.lucapino.confluence.macro

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CodeBlockMacro
    Represents a confluence Code Block Macro.
    CodeBlockMacro.Builder
    A class for implementing the Builder Pattern for CodeBlockMacro.
    ExpandMacro
    Represents an expandable body of rich text.
    ExpandMacro.Builder
    A class for implementing the Builder Pattern for ExpandMacro.
    HtmlMacro
    The HTML macro allows you to add HTML code to a Confluence page.
    JiraIssuesMacro
    A class for building the requisite markup for a JIRA Issues Macro.
    JiraIssuesMacro.Builder
    A class for implementing the Builder Pattern for CodeBlockMacro.
    TableOfContentsMacro
    Represents a confluence Table of Contents Macro.
    TableOfContentsMacro.Builder
    A class for implementing the Builder Pattern for CodeBlockMacro.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CodeBlockMacro.Languages
    The enumerated list of languages supported by the confluence code macro.
    CodeBlockMacro.Parameters
    Parameters are options that you can set to control the content or format of the macro output.
    CodeBlockMacro.Themes
    The available values for the Theme parameter.
    JiraIssuesMacro.Cache
    To be used with the JiraIssuesMacro.Builder.cache(com.github.lucapino.confluence.macro.JiraIssuesMacro.Cache)
    JiraIssuesMacro.Columns
    To be used with JiraIssuesMacro.Builder.count(boolean)
    JiraIssuesMacro.Parameters
    Parameters are options that you can set to control the content or format of the macro output.
    JiraIssuesMacro.RenderMode
    To be used with the JiraIssuesMacro.Builder.renderMode(com.github.lucapino.confluence.macro.JiraIssuesMacro.RenderMode)
    TableOfContentsMacro.Indentation
    The available indentation levels.
    TableOfContentsMacro.ListStyle
    The bullet point style to use for each list item.
    TableOfContentsMacro.OutputType
    The output style of the table of contents.
    TableOfContentsMacro.Parameters
    Parameters are options that you can set to control the content or format of the macro output.
    TableOfContentsMacro.Separator
    This parameter applies to flat lists only.
